catalog_info.title: Greek World Literature: From Homer to Kazantzakis, Cavafy, and Beyond
catalog_info.notes: All texts will be available in English translation.
catalog_info.description: The course focuses on examples of Greek world literature that had a great influence on authors across geographical and linguistic boundaries. Works and authors to be discussed include the Homeric epics, ancient Greek tragedy, C. P. Cavafy, N. Kazantzakis, G. Seferis, O. Elytis, G. Ritsos.
